title: UK election campaign enters final phase
summary: Political parties intensified campaigning ahead of the UK general election, focusing on the economy and public services.

title: UK Labour Party wins general election
summary: The Labour Party won a decisive victory in the UK general election, ending more than a decade of Conservative rule.

title: Hurricane Beryl strengthens in the Caribbean
summary: Hurricane Beryl intensified rapidly, becoming one of the strongest storms ever recorded so early in the Atlantic season.

title: NATO summit focuses on Ukraine support
summary: NATO leaders met to reaffirm long-term military and financial support for Ukraine amid ongoing war.

title: Trump injured in shooting at campaign rally
summary: Former U.S. President Donald Trump was wounded in a shooting at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania; the suspect was killed.

title: Global cyber outage disrupts businesses
summary: A widespread IT outage linked to a software update caused disruptions across airlines, banks, and hospitals worldwide.

title: EU imposes new sanctions on Russia
summary: The European Union approved an additional package of sanctions targeting Russiaâ€™s energy and defense sectors.

title: Wildfires spread across southern Europe
summary: Fast-moving wildfires forced evacuations in parts of Greece, Italy, and Spain during extreme summer heat.

title: Paris prepares for Olympic Games
summary: French authorities completed final security and infrastructure preparations ahead of the Paris 2024 Olympics.

title: U.S. Federal Reserve keeps rates unchanged
summary: The Federal Reserve left interest rates unchanged, citing persistent inflation risks and mixed economic data.
